Package com.idevicesinc.sweetblue

Enum BleServerState

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<BleServerState>
      • com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.BleServerState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BitwiseEnum, Flag, State, UsesCustomNull, Serializable, Comparable<BleServerState>
    public enum BleServerState
extends Enum<BleServerState>
implements State
    An enumeration of the various states that a BleServer can be in on a per-client (mac address) basis. Note that unlike a BleDevice, a BleServer can only be in one state at a time for a given client Use BleServer.setListener_State(ServerStateListener) to be notified of state changes.
    See Also:
    ServerStateListener

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.utils.State

      DISCONNECTED
      SweetBlue equivalent of BluetoothProfile.STATE_DISCONNECTED.
      NULL
      Dummy value returned from any method that would otherwise return Java's built-in null.
      RETRYING_CONNECTION
      This is a state which is a SweetBlue construct.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int bit()
      Returns the bit (0x1, 0x2, 0x4, etc.) this enum represents based on the Flag.ordinal().
      boolean didEnter​(int oldStateBits, int newStateBits)
      Given an old and new state mask, for example from DeviceStateListener.onEvent(com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.DeviceStateListener.StateEvent) or ManagerStateListener.onEvent(com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.ManagerStateListener.StateEvent), this method tells you whether the the 'this' state was appended.
      boolean didExit​(int oldStateBits, int newStateBits)
      Reverse of State.didEnter(int, int).
      boolean isNull()
      Returns true if this state is meant to stand in for Java's built-in null.
      int or​(int bits)
      Does a bitwise OR for this state and the given bits.
      int or​(BitwiseEnum state)
      Does a bitwise OR for this state and the given state.
      boolean overlaps​(int mask)
      Convenience method for checking if (Flag.bit() & mask) != 0x0.
      static int toBits​(BleServerState... states)  
      static BleServerState valueOf​(String name)
      Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.
      static BleServerState[] values()
      Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.

    • Enum Constant Detail

      • NULL

        public static final BleServerState NULL
        Dummy value returned from any method that would otherwise return Java's built-in null. A normal BleDevice will never be in this state, but this will be the sole state of BleServer.NULL.

      • DISCONNECTED

        public static final BleServerState DISCONNECTED
        SweetBlue equivalent of BluetoothProfile.STATE_DISCONNECTED.

      • CONNECTING

        public static final BleServerState CONNECTING
        SweetBlue equivalent of BluetoothProfile.STATE_CONNECTING.

      • CONNECTED

        public static final BleServerState CONNECTED
        SweetBlue equivalent of BluetoothProfile.STATE_CONNECTED.

      • RETRYING_CONNECTION

        public static final BleServerState RETRYING_CONNECTION
        This is a state which is a SweetBlue construct. If the server/client connection fails, but is retrying, this will be it's state.

    • Field Detail

      • FULL_MASK

        public static final int FULL_MASK
        Full bitwise mask made by ORing all BleServerState instances together.
